verses.translation: In the Name of Allah.
May Allah bless Muhammad and his Household.
verses.transliteration: WA SALLA ALLAHU `ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALIHI

verses.translation: “I confide my cause unto Allah.
Surely, Allah is Seer of His slaves.
So, Allah warded off from him the evils which they plotted.”
“There is no god save You. Be You Glorified!
Lo! I have been a wrongdoer.
Then, We heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish.
verses.transliteration: FASTAJABNA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAHU MINA ALGHAMMI

verses.translation: Thus do We save the believers.”
“Allah is Sufficient for us! Most Excellent is He in Whom we trust.
So, they returned with grace and favor from Allah,
verses.transliteration: FANQALABU BINI`MATIN MINA ALLAHI WA FADLIN

verses.translation: and no harm touched them.”
Only that which Allah wills shall come to pass.

verses.text: لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِٱللَّهِ
verses.translation: There is neither strength nor power save with Allah.
verses.transliteration: LA HAWLA WA LA QUWWATA ILLA BILLAHI

verses.text: مَا شَاءَ ٱللَّهُ لاَ مَا شَاءَ ٱلنَّاسُ
verses.translation: Only that which Allah, but not people, wills shall come to pass.
verses.transliteration: MA SHA'A ALLAHU LA MA SHA'A ALNNASU

verses.text: مَا شَاءَ ٱللَّهُ وَإِنْ كَرِهَ ٱلنَّاسُ
verses.translation: Only that which Allah wills shall come to pass even if people detest it.
verses.transliteration: MA SHA'A ALLAHU WA IN KARIHA ALNNASU

verses.translation: Sufficient for me is the Lord against the lorded.
Sufficient for me is the Creator against the creatures.
Sufficient for me is the Sustainer against the sustained.
Sufficient for me is Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
Sufficient for me is He Who is sufficient for me.
Sufficient for me is He Who has been always sufficient for me.

verses.text: حَسْبِي مَنْ كَانَ مُذْ كُنْتُ لَمْ يَزَلْ حَسْبِي
verses.translation: Sufficient for me is He Who had been since eternity and still sufficient for me.
verses.transliteration: HASBI MAN KANA MUDH KUNTU LAM YAZAL HASBI

verses.text: حَسْبِيَ ٱللَّهُ لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ
verses.translation: “Allah suffices me. There is no god save Him.
verses.transliteration: HASBIYA ALLAHU LA ILAHA ILLA HUWA

verses.translation: In Him have I put my trust,
and He is the Lord of the Tremendous Throne.”

verses.text: لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ ٱلْحَلِيمُ
verses.translation: There is no god save Allah, the All-great and Most Forbearing.
verses.transliteration: LA ILAHA ILLA ALLAHU AL`AZIMU ALHALIMU

verses.text: لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيـمِ
verses.translation: There is no god save Allah, the Lord of the Throne of Honor.
verses.transliteration: LA ILAHA ILLA ALLAHU RABBU AL`ARSHI ALKARIMU

verses.translation: All praise be to Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
O Allah, I ask You for the motives of Your mercy,
the determining causes of Your forgiveness,
the advantage of each act of kindness,
and the safeguarding against each and every sin.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ لاَ تَدَعْ لِي ذَنْباً إِلاَّ غَفَرْتَهُ
verses.translation: O Allah, (please) do not leave any of my offenses unforgiven,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA LA TADA` LI DHANBAN ILLA GHAFARTAHU

verses.translation: any of my misfortunes unrelieved,
any of my ailments unhealed,
any of my defects uncovered,
any (item of my) sustenance not including (me),
any fear (that I experience) unsecured,
any evil (that comes upon me) uncontrollable,

verses.text: وَلاَ حَاجَةً هِيَ لَكَ رِضاً وَلِيَ فيهَا صَلاَحٌ إِلاَّ قَضَيْتَهَا
verses.translation: and any need that achieves Your satisfaction and my benefit unanswered.
verses.transliteration: WA LA HAJATAN HIYA LAKA RIDAN WA LIYA FIHA SALAHUN ILLA QADAYTAHA

verses.translation: O most Merciful of all those who show mercy.
(please) Respond, O Lord of the worlds.

verses.text: أَسْتَغْفِرُ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ
verses.translation: I pray the forgiveness of Allah; there is no god save Him,
verses.transliteration: ASTAGHFIRU ALLAHA ALLADHI LA ILAHA ILLA HUWA

verses.translation: the Ever-living, the Self-Subsisting,
the All-compassionate, the All-merciful,
and the Lord of Majesty and Honor.
And I ask Him to accept my repentance,
like His acceptance of the repentance of a slave who is submissive, acquiescent,
poor, miserable,
despondent, dejected, seeking refuge (with Him),

verses.text: لاَ يَمْلِكُ لِنَفْسِهِ نَفْعَاً وَلاَ ضَرّاً
verses.translation: not controlling for himself any harm or profit,
verses.transliteration: LA YAMLIKU LINAFSIHI NAF`AN WA LA DARRAN

verses.text: وَلاَ مَوْتاً وَلاَ حَيَاةً وَلاَ نُشُوراً
verses.translation: and not controlling death nor life nor raising (the dead) to life.
verses.transliteration: WA LA MAWTAN WA LA HAYATAN WA LA NUSHURAN

verses.text: ا َللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ نَفْسٍ لاَ تَشْبَعُ
verses.translation: O Allah, I surely seek Your protection against a self that never has enough,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI A`UDHU BIKA MIN NAFSIN LA TASHBA`U

verses.translation: a heart that does not feel apprehension,
knowledge that does not avail,
a prayer that is not accepted,
and a supplication that is not responded.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ ٱلْيُسْرَ بَعْدَ ٱلْعُسْرِ
verses.translation: O Allah, I surely beseech You for easiness after difficulty,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI AS'ALUKA ALYUSRA BA`DA AL`USRI

verses.translation: relief after misfortune,
and comfort after hardship.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا بِنَا مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ
verses.translation: O Allah, You are certainly the source of each and every favor that covers us.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA MA BINA MIN NI`MATIN FAMINKA

verses.translation: There is no god save You.
I pray Your forgiveness and repent before You.
O Allah! I beseech You for the motives of Your mercy,
the determining causes of Your forgiveness,

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجَاةَ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمِنْ كُلِّ بِلِيَّةٍ
verses.translation: deliverance from Hellfire and all misfortunes,
verses.transliteration: WALNNAJATA MINA ALNNARI WA MIN KULLI BALIYYATIN

verses.text: وَٱلْفَوْزَ بِٱلْجَنَّةِ وَٱلرِّضْوَانِ في دَارِ ٱلسَّلاَمِ
verses.translation: winning Paradise, Divine Contentment in the Abode of Peace,
verses.transliteration: WALFAWZA BILJANNATI WALRRIDWANI FI DARI ALSSALAMI

verses.text: وَجَوَارِ نَبِيِّكَ مُحَمَّدٍ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ ٱلسَّلاَمُ
verses.translation: and the vicinity of Your Prophet Muhammad—peace be upon him and his Household.
verses.transliteration: WA JIWARI NABIYYIKA MUHAMMADIN `ALAYHI WA ALIHI ALSSALAMU

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ مَا بِنَا مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ فَمِنْكَ
verses.translation: O Allah, You are certainly the source of each and every favor that covers us.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA MA BINA MIN NI`MATIN FAMINKA

verses.translation: There is no god save You.
I pray Your forgiveness and I repent before You.

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ إِنَّهُ لَيْسَ لِي عِلْمٌ بِمَوْضِعِ رِزْقِي
verses.translation: O Allah! verily, I lack acquaintance with the place of my sustenance;
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNAHU LAYSA LI `ILMUN BIMAWADI`I RIZQI

verses.text: وَإِنَّمَا أَطْلُبُهُ بِخَطَرَاتٍ تَخْطُرُ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِي
verses.translation: rather, I am seeking it owing to ideas that come upon my mind.
verses.transliteration: WA INNMA ATLUBUHU BIKHATARATIN TAKHTURU `ALA QALBI

verses.translation: I consequently wander in countries searching for it.
By doing such, I am as confused as the confounded,

verses.text: لاَ أَدْرِي أَفِي سَهْلٍ هَوُ أَمْ فِي جَبَلٍ
verses.translation: since I do not know whether my sustenance lies in a plain, on a mountain,
verses.transliteration: LA ADRI AFI SAHLIN HUWA AM FI JABALIN

verses.text: أَمْ في أَرْضٍ أَمْ في سَمَاءٍ
verses.translation: on the ground, in the air,
verses.transliteration: AM FI ARDIN AM FI SAMA'IN

verses.text: أَمْ فِي بَرٍّ أَمْ فِي بَحْرٍ
verses.translation: on lands, in seas,
verses.transliteration: AM FI BARRIN AM FI BAHRIN

verses.translation: at whose hands,
or who the source of it is.
I have full knowledge that You know all these,
the causes of them are in Your Hands,
and it is You Who distribute it out of Your compassion
and cause it out of Your mercy.
O Allah, please send blessings to Muhammad and his Household

verses.text: وَٱجْعَلْ يَا رَبِّ رِزْقَكَ لِي وَاسِعاً
verses.translation: and make, O Lord, Your sustenance that is provided (by You) to me expansive,
verses.transliteration: WAJ`AL YA RABBI RIZQAKA LI WASI`AN

verses.translation: my seeking for it easy for me,
and its source close to me.

verses.text: وَلاَ تُعَنِّنِي بِطَلَبِ مَا لَمْ تُقَدِّرْ لِي فيهِ رِزْقاً
verses.translation: Please, do not fatigue me by seeking that which You have not decided for me to take,
verses.transliteration: WA LA TU`ANNINI BITALBI MA LAM TUQADDIRU LI FIHI RIZQAN

verses.translation: because You are certainly in no need for tormenting me
while I am in full need for Your mercy.
(Please) Send blessings upon Muhammad and his Household
and confer liberally upon me, Your slave, out of Your graciousness.
You are surely the Lord of great favor.

verses.text: اللّهُمّ كُنْ لِوَلِيّكَ الحُجّةِ ابْنِ الحَسَنِ
verses.translation: O Allah, be, for Your representative, the Hujjat (proof), son of Al ­Hassan,
Your blessings be on him and his forefathers,

verses.text: فِي هذِهِ السَّاعَةِ وَفي كُلّ سَاعَةٍ
verses.translation: in this hour and in every hour,
verses.transliteration: FEE HAAZEHIS SAA-A'TE WA FEE KULLE SAA-A'TIN

verses.translation: a guardian, a protector,
a leader, a helper,
a proof, and an eye,
Until You make him live on the earth, in obedience (to You),
and cause him to live in it for a long time
In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

verses.text: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ قَبْلَ ٱلْإِنْشَاءِ وَٱلْإِحْيَاءِ
verses.translation: All praise be to Allah, the First before the bringing forth and the giving of life,
verses.transliteration: ALHAMDU LILLAHI AL-AWWALI QABLA AL-INSHA'I WAL-IHYA'I

verses.translation: and the Last after the annihilation of all things,

verses.text: ٱلْعَلِيمِ ٱلَّذِي لاَ يَنْسَىٰ مَنْ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: the All-knowing Who forgets not him who remembers Him,
verses.transliteration: AL`ALIMI ALLADHI LA YANSA MAN DHAKARAHU

verses.translation: decreases not him who thanks Him,
disappoints not him who supplicates Him,
and cuts not off the hope of him who hopes in Him!
verses.transliteration: WA LA YAQTA`U RAJA'A MAN RAJAHU

verses.translation: O Allah, I call You to witness
and You are sufficient Witness
and I call to witness all Your angels,
the inhabitants of Your heavens,
the bearers of Your Throne,
Your prophets and Your messengers whom You have sent out,
verses.transliteration: WA MAN BA`ATHTA MIN ANBIYA'IKA WA RUSULIKA

verses.translation: and the various kinds of creatures You have brought forth,
that I bear witness that You are Allah;
there is no god but You, You alone,
Who have no associate nor any equal,
and Your word has no failing, nor any change;
verses.transliteration: WA LA KHULFA LIQAWLIKA WA LA TABDILA

verses.text: وَ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً صَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ
verses.translation: and that Muhammad, Allah bless him and his Household, is Your servant and Your messenger;
verses.transliteration: WA ANNA MUHAMMADAN SALLA ALLAHU `ALAYHI WA ALIHI `ABDUKA WA RASULUKA

verses.translation: he delivered to the servants that with which You charged him,

verses.text: وَجَاهَدَ فِي ٱللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ حَقَّ ٱلْجِهَادِ
verses.translation: struggled for Allah as is His due,
verses.transliteration: WA JAHADA FI ALLAHI `AZZA WA JALLA HAQQA ALJIHADI

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ بَشَّرَ بِما هُوَ حَقُّ مِنَ ٱلثَّوابِ
verses.translation: gave the good news of the truth of reward,
verses.transliteration: WA ANNAHU BASHSHARA BIMA HUWA HAQQUN MIN ALTHTHAWABI

verses.text: وَ أَنْذَرَ بِما هُوَ صِدْقٌ مِنَ ٱلعِقَابِ
verses.translation: and warned of the veracity of punishment.
verses.transliteration: WA ANDHARA BIMA HUWA SIDQUN MIN AL`IQABI

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْنِي عَلَىٰ دِينِكَ مَا أَحْيَيْتَنِي
verses.translation: O Allah, make me firm in Your religion as long as You keep me alive,

verses.text: وَلاَ تُزِغْ قَلْبِي بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنِي
verses.translation: make not my heart swerve after You have guided me,
verses.transliteration: WA LA TUZIGH QALBI BA`DA IDH HADAYTANI

verses.translation: and give me mercy from You,
verses.transliteration: WA HAB LI MIN LADUNKA RAHMATAN

verses.translation: surely, You are the All-bestower.
Bless Muhammad and the Household of Muhammad,
make me one of his followers and his partisans,
muster me in his band,
and give me the success of accomplishing the obligatory observance of Fridays,

verses.text: وَمَا أَوْجَبْتَ عَلَيَّ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلطَّاعَاتِ
verses.translation: performing the acts of obedience which You have made incumbent upon me within it,
verses.transliteration: WA MA AWJABTA `ALAYYA FIHA MIN ATTA`ATI

verses.translation: and receiving the bestowal which You have apportioned for its people
on the Day of Recompense!
Surely, You are the Almighty, the All-wise!
In the Name of Allah, the All-merciful, the All-compassionate

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْألُكَ بِرَحْمَتِكَ الَّتِي وَسِعَتْ كُلَّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which embraces all things;
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IN-NI AS-ALUKA BI-RAH-MATIKAL-LATI WASI`AT KUL-LA SHAY

verses.text: وَبِقُوَّتِكَ الَّتِي قَهَرْتَ بِهَا كُلَّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: And by Your strength, through which You dominatest all things,
verses.transliteration: WA BI-QU-WATIKAL-LATI QAHAR-TA BIHA KUL-LA SHAY

verses.translation: And toward which all things are humble
And before which all things are lowly;

verses.text: وَبِجَبرُوتِكَ الَّتِي غَلَبْتَ بِهَا كُلَّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: And by Your invincibility through which You overwhelmest all things,
verses.transliteration: WA BI-JABARUTIKAL-LATI GHALAB-TA BIHA KUL-LA SHAY

verses.text: وَبِعِزَّتِكَ الَّتِي لا يَقُومُ لَهَا شَيْءٌ
verses.translation: And by Your might, which nothing can resist;
verses.transliteration: WA BI`IZZATIKAL-LATI LA YAQUMU LAHA SHAY

verses.translation: And by Your tremendousness, which has filled all things;
by Your force, which towers over all things;

verses.text: وَبِوَجْهِكَ الْبَاقِي بَعْدَ فَنَاءِ كُلِّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: And by Your face, which subsists after the annihilation of all things,
verses.transliteration: WA BI-WAJ-HIKAL-BAQI BA`DA FANA-I KUL-LI SHAY

verses.text: وَبِأَسْمَائِكَ الَّتِي مَلأَتْ أَرْكَانَ كُلِّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: And by Your Names, which have filled the foundations of all things;
verses.transliteration: WA BI-AS-MA-IKAL-LATI MALAT AR-KANA KUL-LI SHAY

verses.translation: And by Your knowledge, which encompasses all things;

verses.text: وَبِنُورِ وَجْهِكَ الَّذِي أَضَاءَ لَهُ كُلُّ شَيٍْء
verses.translation: And by the light of Your face, through which all things are illumined!
verses.transliteration: WA BI-NURI WAJ-HIKAL-LADHI ADA-A LAHU KUL-LU SHAY

verses.translation: O Light! O All-holy!
O First of those who are first
And O Last of those who are last!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تَهتِكُ الْعِصَمَ
verses.translation: O Allah, forgive me those sins which tear apart safeguards!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تُنْزِلُ النِّقَمَ
verses.translation: O Allah, forgive me those sins which draw down adversities!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تُغيِّرُ النِّعَمَ
verses.translation: O Allah, forgive me those sins which alter blessings!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تَحْبِسُ الدُّعَاءَ
verses.translation: O Allah forgive me those sins which hold back supplication!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تَقْطَعُ الرََّّجَاءَ
verses.translation: O Allah forgive me those sins which cut down the hopes!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي الذُّنُوبَ الَّتِي تُنْزِلُ البَلاءَ
verses.translation: O Allah, forgive me those sins which draw down tribulation!

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي كُلَّ ذَنْبٍ أَذْنَبْتُهُ وَكُلَّ خَطِيئَةٍ أَخْطَأْتُهَا
verses.translation: O Allah, forgive me every sin I have committed and every mistake I have made!
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA-IGH-FIR LIYA KUL-LA DHAM-BIN ADHNABTUHU WA KUL-LA KHATI-ATIN AKH-TATUHA

verses.translation: O Allah, verily I seek nearness to You through remembrance of You,
And I seek intercession from You with Yourself,

verses.text: وَأَسْألُكَ بِجُودِكَ أَن تُدْنِيَنِي مِن قُرْبِكَ
verses.translation: And I ask You through Your munificence to bring me near to Your proximity,
verses.transliteration: WA AS-ALUKA BI-JUDIKA AN TUD-NI-YANI MIN QUR-BIK

verses.translation: And to provide me with gratitude toward You
And to inspire me with Your remembrance.

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْألُكَ سُؤَالَ خَاضِعٍ مُّتَذَلِّلٍ خَاشِعٍ أَن تُسَامِحَنِي وَتَرْحَمَنِي
verses.translation: O Allah, verily I ask You with the asking of a submissive, abased and lowly man to show me forbearance, to have mercy on me
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IN-NI AS-LUKA SUALA KHADII'M-MUTADHAL-LILIN KHA-SHII'N AN TUSAMIHANI WA TAR-HAMANI

verses.text: وَتَجْعلَنِي بِقَسَمِكَ رَاضِياً قَانِعاً، وَفِي جَمِيعِ الأَحْوَاِل مُتَوَاضِعاً
verses.translation: And to make me satisfied and content with Your appointment and [make me] humble in every state.
verses.transliteration: WA TAJ-`ALANI BI-QASAMIKA RADIYAN QANI`N WA FI JAMII'L-AH-WALI MUTAWADI`AA

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ وَأَسْألُكَ سُؤَالَ مَنِ اشْتَدَّتْ فَاقَتُهُ
verses.translation: O Allah, I ask You the question of one whose indigence is extreme,
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA WA AS-ALUKA SUALA MANISH-TAD-DAT FAQATUH

verses.translation: And who has stated to You in difficulties his need
And whose desire for what is with You has become great.
O Allah, Your force is tremendous, Your place is lofty,
And Your plan is hidden, Your command is manifest,
And Your domination is overwhelming, Your power is unhindered
verses.transliteration: WA GHALABA QAH-RUKA WA JARAT QUD-RATUK

verses.translation: And escape from Your governance is impossible.
O Allah, I find no forgiver of my sins,
Nor concealer of my ugly acts

verses.text: وَّلا لِشَيٍْء مِّنْ عَمَلِي الْقَبِيحِ بِالْحَسَنِ مُبَدِّلاً غَيْرَكَ
verses.translation: Nor transformer of any of my ugly acts into good acts but You
There is no god but You!
Glory be to You, and Thine is the praise!
I have wronged myself,
And I have been audacious in my ignorance

verses.text: وَسَكَنتُ إِلَي قَدِيمِ ذِكْرِكَ لِي وَمَنِّكَ عَلَيَّ
verses.translation: And I have depended upon Your ancient remembrance of me and Your favour toward me.
verses.transliteration: WA SAKAN-TU ILA QADIMI DHIK-RIKA LI WA MAN-NIKA `ALAY

verses.translation: O Allah! O my Protector!
How many ugly things You hast concealed!

verses.text: وَكَم مِّن فَاِدحٍ مِّنَ البَلاءِ أَقَلْتَهُ
verses.translation: How many burdensome tribulations You hast abolished!
And how many stumbles You hast prevented!
And how many ordeals You hast repelled!

verses.text: وَكَم مِّن ثَنَاٍء جَمِيلٍ لَّسْتُ أَهْلاً لَّهُ نَشَرْتَهُ
verses.translation: And how much beautiful praise, for which I was unworthy, You hast spread abroad!
verses.transliteration: WA KAM-MIN THANA-IN JAMILIL-LAS-TU AH-LAL-LAHU NASHAR-TAH

verses.translation: O Allah, my tribulation is tremendous,
And my bad state is excessive,
And my acts are inadequate,
And my fetters have tied me down,
And my far-fetched hopes have held me back from my gain

verses.text: وَخَدَعَتْنِي الدُّنْيَا بِغُرُورِهَا وَنَفْسِي بِجِنَايَتِهَا وَمِطَاِلي
verses.translation: And this world with its delusions, my own soul with its offences and my delay have deceived me.
verses.transliteration: WA KHADA`AT-NID-DUNYA BI-GHURURI-HA WA NAF-SI BI-JINAYATIHA WA MITA-LI

verses.text: يَا سَيِّدِي فَأَسْألُكَ بِعِزَّتِكَ أَن لا يَحْجُبَ عَنْكَ دُعَائِي سُوءُ عَمَلِي وَفِعَاِلي
verses.translation: O my Master! So I ask You by Your might not to let my evil works and acts veil my supplication from You,
verses.transliteration: YA SAY-YIDI FA-AS-ALUKA BI-I'Z-ZATIKA AN LA YAH-JUBA `AN-KA DU`AA-I SUO-U `AMALI WA FI`ALI

verses.text: وَلا تَفْضَحَنِي بِخَفِيِّ مَا اطَّلَعْتَ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ سِرِّي
verses.translation: And not to disgrace me through the hidden things You knowest of my secrets
verses.transliteration: WA-LA TAF-DAH-NI BI-KHAFI-YI MAT-TALA`TA `AILAYHI MIN SIR-RI

verses.text: وَلا تُعَاجِلْنِي بِالْعُقُوبَةِ عَلَى مَا عَمِلْتُهُ فِي خَلَوَاتِي
verses.translation: And not to hasten me to punishment for what I have done in private:
verses.transliteration: WA-LA TU`AJIL-NI BIL-U'QUBATI `ALA MA `AMIL-TUHU FI KHALAWATI

verses.translation: My evil acts in secrecy and my misdeeds
And my continuous negligence and my ignorance
And my manifold passions and my forgetfulness.

verses.text: وَكُنِ اللَّهُمَّ بِعِزَّتِكَ لِي فِي كُلِّ الأَحْوَاِل رَؤُوفاً
verses.translation: And by Your might, O Allah, be kind to me in all states
verses.transliteration: WA KUNIL-LAHUMMA BI-I'Z-ZATIKA LI FI KUL-LIL-AH-WALI RA’UFA

verses.translation: And be gracious to me in all affairs!

verses.text: إِلَهِي وَرَبِّي مَن لِّي غَيْرُكَ أَسْألُهُ كَشْفَ ضُرِّي وَالْنَّظَرَ فِي أَمْرِي!
verses.translation: My God and my Lord! Have I any but You from whom to ask removal of my affliction and regard for my affairs!
verses.transliteration: ILAHI WA RAB-BI MAL-LI GHAYRUKA AS-ALUHU KASH-FA DUR-RI WAN-NAZARA FI AM-RI!

verses.text: إِلَهِي وَمَوْلاي أَجْرَيْتَ عَلَيَّ حُكْماً اتَّبَعْتُ فِيهِ هَوَى نَفْسِي،
verses.translation: My God and my Protector! You put into effect through me a decree in which I followed the caprice of my own soul
verses.transliteration: ILAHI WA MAW-LAYA AJ-RAYTA `ALAY-YA HUK-MANT-TABA`TU FIHI HAWA NAF-SI

verses.text: وَلَمْ أَحْتَرِسْ فِيهِ مِن تَزْيينِ عَدُوِّي،
verses.translation: And [I] did not remain wary of adorning my enemy.
verses.transliteration: WA LAM AH-TARIS FIHI MIN TAZYINI `ADU-WI

verses.text: فَغَرَّنِي بِمَا أَهْوَى وَأَسْعَدَهُ عَلَى ذَلِكَ القَضَاءُ
verses.translation: So he deluded me through my soul's caprice and therein destiny favoured him
verses.transliteration: FA-GHAR-RANI BI-MA AH-WA WA AS-`ADAHU `ALA DHA-LIKAL-QADA

verses.text: فَتَجَاوَزْتُ بِمَا جَرَى عَلَيَّ مِنْ ذَلِكَ بَعْضَ حُدُودِكَ
verses.translation: So, in what was put into effect through me in that situation, I transgressed some of Your statutes
verses.transliteration: FA-TAJA-WAZTU BI-MA JARA `ALAY-YA MIN DHA-LIKA BA`DA HUDUDIK

verses.translation: And disobeyed some of Your commands.

verses.text: فَلَكَ الْحُجَّةُ عَلَيَّ فِي جَمِيعِ ذَلِكَ
verses.translation: So Thine is the argument against me in all of that

verses.text: وَلا حُجَّةَ لِي فِيمَا جَرَي عَلَيَّ فِيهِ قَضَاؤُكَ،
verses.translation: I have no argument in what Your destiny put into effect through me therein
verses.transliteration: WA-LA HUJ-JATA LI FIMA JARA `ALAY-YA FIHI QADAUKA

verses.translation: nor in what Your decree and Your tribulation imposed upon me.

verses.text: وَقَدْ أَتَيْتُكَ يَا إِلَهِي بَعْدَ تَقْصِيرِي وَإِسْرَافِي عَلَى نَفْسِي
verses.translation: Now I have come to You, My God, after my shortcoming and my immoderation toward myself,
verses.transliteration: WA QAD ATAYTUKA YA ILAHI BA`DA TAQ-SIRI WA IS-RAFI `ALA NAF-SI

verses.translation: Proffering my excuse, regretful,
Broken, apologizing,
Asking forgiveness, repenting,
Acknowledging, submissive, confessing.

verses.text: لا أَجِدُ مَفَرّاً مِّمَّا كَانَ مِنِّي
verses.translation: I find no place to flee from what occurred through me,

verses.text: وَلا مَفْزَعاً أَتَوَجَّهُ إِلَيْهِ في أَمْرِي
verses.translation: Nor any place of escape to which I may turn in my affairs,
verses.transliteration: WA-LA MAFZA'AN ATAWAJ-JAHU ILAYHI FI AM-RI

verses.text: غَيْرَ قَبُولِكَ عُذْرِي، وَإِدخَاِلكَ إِيَاي فِي سَعَةٍ مِّن رَّحْمَتِكَ
verses.translation: Other than Your acceptance of my excuse and Your entering me into the compass of Your mercy.
verses.transliteration: GHAYRA QABULIKA U'DHRI WA ID-KHALIKA I-YAYA FI SA'TIM-MIR-RAH-MATIK

verses.translation: O Allah, so accept my excuse,
Have mercy upon the severity of my affliction
And release me from the tightness of my fetters,

verses.text: يَا رَبِّ ارْحَمْ ضَعْفَ بَدَنِي وَرِقَّةَ جِلْدِي وَدِقَّةَ عَظْمِي
verses.translation: My Lord, have mercy upon the weakness of my body, the thinness of my skin and the frailty of my bones.
verses.transliteration: YA RAB-BIR-HAM DA`FA BADANI WA RIQ-QATA JIL-DI WA DIQ-QATA `AZMI

verses.text: يَا مَنْ بَدَأَ خَلْقِي وَذِكْرِي وَتَرْبِيَتِي وَبِرِّي وَتَغْذِيَتِي
verses.translation: O You who gave rise to my creation, to the remembrance of me, to the nurture of me, to goodness toward me and to nourishment on me,
verses.transliteration: YA MAM BADA KHAL-QI WA DHIK-RI WA TAR-BI-YATI WA BIRI WA TAGH-DHI-YATI

verses.text: هَبْنِي لابْتِدَاءِ كَرَمِكَ وَسَاِلفِ بِرِّكَ بِي
verses.translation: Bestow upon me for the sake of Your having given rise [to me] with generosity and Your previous goodness to me!
verses.transliteration: HAB-NI LB-TIDA-I KARAMIKA WA SALIFI BIR-RIKA BI

verses.translation: O Allah, my Master and my Lord!
verses.transliteration: YA ILAHI WA SAY-YIDI WA RAB-BI

verses.translation: Canst You see Yourself tormenting me with Your fire after I have professed Your Unity

verses.text: وَبَعْدَ مَا انْطَوَى عَلَيْهِ قَلْبِي مِن مَّعْرِفَتِكَ
verses.translation: And after the knowledge of You my heart has embraced,
And the remembrance of You my tongue has constantly mentioned
verses.transliteration: WA LAHIJA BIHI LISANI MIN DHIK-RIK

verses.translation: And the love of You to which my mind has clung,

verses.text: وَبَعْدَ صِدْقِ اعْتِرَافِي وَدُعَائِي خَاضِعاً لِّرُبُوبِيَّتِكَ
verses.translation: And after the sincerity of my confession and my supplication, humble before Your lordship?
verses.transliteration: WA BA`DA SID-QI-`A-TIRAFI WA DU`AA-I KHADI`AAL-LI-RUBUBI-YATIKA

verses.text: هَيْهَاتَ أَنتَ أَكْرَمُ مِنْ أَن تُضَيِّعَ مَن رَّبَّيْتَهُ
verses.translation: Far be it from You! You art more generous than that You shouldst squander him whom You hast nurtured,
verses.transliteration: HAYHATA ANTA AK-RAMU MIN AN TUDAY-YI`A MAR-RAB-BAYTAH

verses.translation: Or banish him whom You hast brought nigh,
Or drive away him whom You hast given an abode

verses.text: أَوْ تُسْلِّمَ إِلىَ الْبلاءِ مَن كَفَيْتَهُ وَرَحِمْتَهُ
verses.translation: Or submit to tribulation him whom You hast spared and shown mercy.
verses.transliteration: AW TUS-S-LIMA ILAL-BALA-I MAN KAFAY-TAHU WA RAHIM-TAH

verses.text: وَلَيْتَ شِعْرِي يَا سَيِّدِي وَإِلَهِي وَمَوْلاي
verses.translation: Would that I knew, my Master, My God and my Protector,
verses.transliteration: WA LAYTA SHI`A-RI YAY SAY-YIDI WA ILAHI WA MAW-LAY

verses.text: أَتُسَلِّطُ النَّارَ عَلَى وُجُوهٍ خَرَّتْ لِعَظَمَتِكَ سَاجِدَةً
verses.translation: Whether You wilt give the Fire dominion over faces fallen down prostrate before Your Tremendousness,

verses.text: وَّعَلَى أَلْسُنٍ نَّطَقَتْ بِتَوْحِيدِكَ صَادِقَةً وَّبِشُكْرِكَ مَادِحَةً
verses.translation: And over tongues voicing sincerely the profession of Your Unity and giving thanks to You in praise,
verses.transliteration: WA `ALA AL-SUNIN-NATAQAT BI-TAW-HIDIKA SADIQATAW-WA BISHUK-RIKA MADIHAH

verses.translation: And over hearts acknowledging Your Divinity through verification,

verses.text: وَّعَلَى ضَمَائِرَ حَوَتْ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ بِكَ حَتَّى صَارَتْ خَاشِعَةً
verses.translation: And over minds encompassing knowledge of You until they have become humble
verses.transliteration: WA `ALA DAMA-IRA HAWAT MINAL-I'L-MI BIKA HAT-TA SARAT KHASHI`AH

verses.text: وَّعَلَى جَواِرحَ سَعَتْ إِلَى أَوْطَانِ تَعَبُّدِكَ طَائِعَةً وَّأَشَارَتْ بِاسْتِغْفَارِكَ مُذْعِنَةً
verses.translation: And over bodily members speeding to the places of Your worship in obedience and beckoning for Your forgiveness in submission.
verses.transliteration: WA `ALA JAWARIHA SA'T ILA AW-TANI TA'B-BUDIKA TA-I`ATAW-WA ASHARAT BIS-TIGH-FARIKA MUDHI'NAH

verses.text: مَّا هَكَذَا الظَّنُّ بِكَ وَلا أُخْبِرْنَا بِفَضْلِكَ عَنكَ
verses.translation: No such opinion is held of You! Nor has such been reported - thanks to Your bounty — concerning You,
verses.transliteration: MA HKADHAZ-ZAN-NU BIKA WA-LA UKH-BIR-NA BI-FADLIKA `ANKA

verses.translation: O All-generous! My Lord,

verses.text: وَأَنتَ تَعْلَمُ ضَعْفِي عَن قَلِيلٍ مِّن بَلاءِ الدُّنْيَا وَعُقُوبَاتِهَا،
verses.translation: And You knowest my weakness before a little of this world's tribulations and punishments,
verses.transliteration: WA ANTA TA`LAMU DA`FI `AN QALILIM-MIN BALA-ID-DUN-YA WA U'QUBATIHA

verses.text: وَمَا يَجْرِي فِيهَا مِنَ الْمَكَارِهِ عَلَى أَهْلِهَا
verses.translation: And before those ordeals which befall its inhabitants,
verses.transliteration: WA MA YAJ-RI FIHA MINAL-MAKARIHI `ALA AH-LIHA

verses.text: عَلَى أَنَّ ذَلِكَ بَلاءٌ وَّمَكْرُوهٌ، قَلِيلٌ مَّكْثُهُ، يَسِيرٌ بَقَاؤُهُ، قَصِيرٌ مُّدَّتُهُ
verses.translation: Even though it is a tribulation and ordeal whose stay is short, whose subsistence is but little and, whose period is but fleeting.
verses.transliteration: `ALA AN-NA DHA-LIKA BALA-UW-WA MAK-RUHUN, QALILUM-MAK-THUHU, YASIRUM BAQA-UHU, QASIRUM-MUD-DATUH

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ احْتِمَاِلي لِبَلاءِ الآخِرَةِ وَجَلِيلِ وُقُوعِ الْمَكَارِهِ فِيهَا!
verses.translation: So how can I endure the tribulations of the next world and the great ordeals that occur within it?
verses.transliteration: FA-KAYFAH-TIMALI LI-BALA-IL-AKHIRATI WA JALILI WUQUI'L-MAKARIHI FIHA!

verses.text: وَهُوَ بَلاءٌ تَطُولُ مُدَّتُهُ، وَيَدُومُ مَقَامُهُ، وَلا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْ أَهْلِهِ
verses.translation: For it is a tribulation whose period is long, whose station endures and whose sufferers are given no respite,
verses.transliteration: WA HUWA BALA-UN TATULU MUD-DATUHU, WA YADUMU MAQAMUHU, WA-LA YUKHAF-FAFU `AN AH-LIH

verses.text: لأَنَّهُ لا يَكُونُ إِلاَّ عَنْ غَضَبِكَ وَانتِقَامِكَ وَسَخَطِكَ
verses.translation: Since it only occurs as a result of Your wrath, Your vengeance and Your anger,
verses.transliteration: LI-AN-NAHU LA YAKUNU IL-LA `AN GHADABIKA WAN-TIQAMIKA WA SAKHATIK

verses.text: وَهَذَا مَا لا تَقُومُ لَهُ السَّمَاوَاتُ وَالأَرْضُ
verses.translation: And these cannot be withstood by the heavens and the earth.
verses.transliteration: WA HADHA MA LA TAQUMU LAHUS-SAMAWATU WAL-ARDU

verses.translation: O Master, so what about me?!

verses.text: وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ الضَّعِيفُ الذَّلِيلُ الْحَقِيرُ الْمِسْكِينُ الْمُسْتَكِينُ
verses.translation: For I am Your weak, lowly, base, wretched and miserable slave.
My God! My Lord! My Master! My Protector!
verses.transliteration: YA ILAHI WA RAB-BI WA SAY-YIDI WA MAW-LAY

verses.translation: For which things would I complain to You?
And for which of them would I lament and weep?
verses.transliteration: WA LIMA MINHA ADIJ-JU WA AB-KI

verses.translation: For the pain and severity of chastisement?
Or for the length and period of tribulation?
So if You takest me to the punishments with Your enemies,
And gatherest me with the people of Your tribulation
verses.transliteration: WA JAMA`TA BAYNI WA BAYNA AHLI BALA-IK

verses.translation: And separatest me from Your friends and saints,
verses.transliteration: WA FAR-RAQ-TA BAY-NI WA BAY-NA AHIB-BA-IKA WA AW-LI-YA-IK

verses.text: فَهَبْنِي يَا إِلَهِي وَسَيِّدِي وَمَوْلاي وَرَبِّي صَبَرْتُ عَلَى عَذَابِكَ،
verses.translation: Then suppose, My God, my Master, my Protector and my Lord that I am able to endure Your chastisement,
verses.transliteration: FA-HAB-NI YA ILAHI WASAY-YIDI WA MAWLAYA WA RAB-BI SABAR-TU `ALA `ADHABIKA

verses.translation: How can I endure separation from You?
And suppose that I am able to endure the heat of Your fire,

verses.text: فَكَيْفَ أَصْبِرُ عَنِ النَّظَرِ إِلَى كَرَامَتِكَ
verses.translation: How can I endure not gazing upon Your generosity?

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ أَسْكُنُ فِي النَّارِ وَرَجَائِي عَفْوُكَ
verses.translation: Or how can I dwell in the Fire while my hope is Your pardon?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA AS-KUNU FIN-NARI WA RAJA-I `AF-WUK

verses.text: فَبِعِزَّتِكَ يَا سَيِّدِي وَمَوْلاي أُقْسِمُ صَادِقاً، لَئِن تَرَكْتَنِي نَاطِقاً
verses.translation: So by Your might, my Master and my protector, I swear sincerely, if You leavest me with speech,
verses.transliteration: FABI-I'Z-ZATIKA YA SAY-YIDI WA MAWLAYA UQ-SIMU SADIQAL-LA-IN TARAK-TANI NATIQAN

verses.text: لأَضِجَّنَّ إِلَيْكَ بَيْنَ أَهْلِهَا ضَجِيجَ الآمِلِينَ
verses.translation: I will lament to You from the midst of the Fire's inhabitants with lamentation of the hopeful;
I will cry to You with the cry of those crying for help;
I will weep to You with the weeping of the bereft;

verses.text: وَلأُنَادِيَنَّكَ أَيْنَ كُنتَ يَا وَلِيَّ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And I will call to You, Where art You, O Sponsor of the believers,
verses.transliteration: WA LA-UNADI-YAN-NAKA AY-NA KUN-TA YA WALI-YAL-MU-MININ

verses.translation: O Goal of the hopes of Your knowers,
O Aid of those who seek assistance,
O Friend of the hearts of the sincere
And O God of all the world's inhabitants!

verses.text: أَفَتُرَاكَ، سُبْحَانَكَ يَا إِلَهِي وَبِحَمْدِكَ، تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا صَوْتَ عَبْدٍ مُّسْلِمٍ
verses.translation: Canst You see Yourself — Glory be to You My God, and Thine is the praised — hearing within the Fire the voice of a slave surrendered to You,
verses.transliteration: AFATURAKA SUB-HANAKA YA ILAHI WA BIHAM-DIKA TAS-MAU' FIHA SAW-TA `AB-DIM-MUS-LIMIN

verses.translation: Imprisoned there because of his violations,
Tasting the favour of its torment because of his disobedience,
And confined within its levels because of his sin and crime,
verses.transliteration: WA HUBISA BAYNA AT-BAQIHA BIJUR-MIH WA JARIRATIH

verses.text: وَهُوَ يَضِجُّ إلَيْكَ ضَجِيجَ مُؤَمِّلٍ لِّرَحْمَتِكَ
verses.translation: While he laments to You with the lament of one hopeful for Your mercy,
verses.transliteration: WA HUWA YADIJ-JU ILAYKA DAJIJA MUAMMILIL-LIRAH-MAT-K

verses.translation: And calls to You with the tongue of those who profess Your Unity
And entreats You by Your lordship!

verses.text: يَا مَوْلاي فَكَيْفَ يَبقَى فِي الْعَذَابِ وَهُوَ يَرْجُو مَا سَلَفَ مِنْ حِلْمِكَ
verses.translation: My Protector, so how should he remain in the chastisement, while he has hope for Your previous clemency?
verses.transliteration: YA MAWLAY FA-KAYFA YABQA FIL-`ADHABI WA HUWA YAR-JU MA SALAFA MIN HIL-MIK

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ تُؤْلِمُهُ النَّارُ وَهُوَ يَامَلُ فَضْلَكَ وَرَحْمَتَكَ
verses.translation: Or how should the Fire cause him pain while he expects Your bounty and mercy?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA TU-LIMUHUN-NARU WA HUWA YA-MALU FADLAKA WA RAH-MATAKA

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ يُحْرِقُهُ لَهِيبُهَا وَأَنتَ تَسْمَعُ صَوْتَهُ وَتَرَى مَكَانَهُ
verses.translation: Or how should its flames burn him, while You hearest his voice and seest his place?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA YUH-RIQUHU LAHIBUHA WA ANTA TAS-MAU' SAW-TAHU WA TARA MAKANAH

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ يَشْتَمِلُ عَلَيْهِ زَفِيرُهَا وَأَنتَ تَعْلَمُ ضَعْفَهُ
verses.translation: Or how should its groaning encompass him, while You knowest his weakness?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA YASH-TAMILU `AILAYHI ZAFIRUHA WA ANTA TA`LAMU DA`FAH

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ يَتَقَلْقَلُ بَيْنَ أَطْبَاقِهَا وَأَنتَ تَعْلَمُ صِدْقَهُ
verses.translation: Or how should he be convulsed among its levels, while You knowest his sincerity?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA YATAQALQALU BAYNA AT-BAQIHA WA ANTA TA`LAMU SID-QAH

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ تَزْجُرُهُ زَبَانِيَتُهَا وَهُوَ يُنَادِيكَ يَا رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Or how should its keepers torture him while he calls out to You, O Lord?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA TAZJURUHU ZABANI-YATUHA WA HUWA YUNADIKA YA RAB-BAH

verses.text: أَمْ كَيْفَ يَرْجُو فَضْلَكَ فِي عِتْقِهِ مِنْهَا فَتَتْرُكُهُ فِيهَا
verses.translation: Or how should he have hope of Your bounty in freeing him from it, while You abandonest him within it?
verses.transliteration: AM KAYFA YAR-JU FADLAKA FI I'T-QIHI MINHA FATAT-RUKUHU FIHA

verses.translation: Far be it from You! That is not what is expected of You,
Nor what is well-known of Your bounty,

verses.text: وَلا مُشْبِهٌ لِمَا عَامَلْتَ بِهِ الْمُوَحِّدِينَ مِنْ بِرِّكَ وَإِحْسَانِكَ
verses.translation: Nor it is similar to the goodness and kindness You hast shown to those who profess Your Unity.
verses.transliteration: WA-LA MUSH-BIHA LIMA `AMAL-TA BIHIL-MUAH-HIDINA MIM BIR-RIKA WA IH-SANIK

verses.text: فَبِالْيَقِينِ أَقْطَعُ لَوْلا مَا حَكَمْتَ بِهِ مِن تَعْذِيبِ جَاحِدِيكَ
verses.translation: So I declare with certainty that were it not for what You hast decreed concerning the chastisement of Your deniers
verses.transliteration: FA-BIAL-YAQINI AQ-TAU' LAW-LA MA HAKAM-TA BIHI MIN TA`DHIBI JAHIDIK

verses.translation: And what You hast foreordained concerning the everlasting home of those who stubbornly resist,
verses.transliteration: WA QADAYTA BIHI MIN IKH-LAYDI MU`ANIDIK

verses.translation: You wouldst make the Fire, all of it, coolness and safety,

verses.text: وَمَا كَانَ لأَحَدٍ فِيهَا مَقَرّاً وَّلا مُقَاماً
verses.translation: And no one would have a place of rest or abode within it.
verses.transliteration: WA MA KANA LI-AHADIN FIHA MAQAR-RAW-WA-LA MUQAMA

verses.text: لَّكِنَّكَ تَقَدَّسَتْ أَسْمَاؤُكَ أَقْسَمْتَ أَنْ تَمْلأَهَا مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ،
verses.translation: But You—holy are Your Names—hast sworn that You wilt fill it with the unbelievers,
verses.transliteration: LAKIN-NAKA TAQAD-DASAT AS-MA-UKA AQ-SAM-TA AN TAM-LAHA MINAL-KAFIRINA;

verses.translation: Both Jinn and men together,
And that You wilt place those who stubbornly resist therein forever.

verses.text: وَأَنتَ جَلَّ ثَنَاؤُكَ قُلْتَ مُبْتَدَئاً، وَّتَطَوَّلْتَ بِالإِنْعَامِ مُتَكَرِّماً:
verses.translation: And You— majestic is Your eulogy— said at the beginning and wernt gracious through kindness as a favour,
verses.transliteration: WA ANTA JAL-LA THANA-UKA QUL-TA MUB-TADIWAW-WA TATAW-WAL-TA BIL-IN-`AMI MUTAKAR-RIMA

verses.text: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤْمِنًا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقًا ۚ لَّا يَسْتَوُونَ
verses.translation: (What? Is he who has been believer like unto him who has been ungodly? They are not equal)
verses.transliteration: AFAMAN KANA MUMINAN KAMAN KANA FASIQAL-LA YAS-TAWUN

verses.text: إِلَهِي وَسَيِّدِي فَأَسْألُكَ بِالْقُدْرَةِ الَّتِي قَدَّرْتَهَا
verses.translation: My God and my Master! So I ask You by the power You hast apportioned
verses.transliteration: ILAHI WA SAY-YIDI FA-AS-ALUKA BIAL-QUD-RATIL-LATI QAD-DARTAHA

verses.text: وَبِالْقَضِيَّةِ الَّتِي حَتَمْتَهَا وَحَكَمْتَهَا وَغَلَبْتَ مَنْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرَيْتَهَا
verses.translation: And by the decision which You hast determined and imposed and through which You hast overcome him toward whom it has been put into effect,
verses.transliteration: WA BIL-QADI-YATIL-LATI HATAM-TAHA WA HAKAM-TAHA WA GHALAB-TA MAN `AILAYHI AJ-RAYTAHA

verses.text: أَن تَهَبَ لِي، فِي هذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ، وَفِي هَذِهِ السَّاعَةِ
verses.translation: That You forgivest me in this night and at this hour
verses.transliteration: AN TAHABA LI FI HADHIHIL-LAYLATI WA FI HADHIHIS-SA'AH

verses.translation: Every offence I have committed,
And every sin I have performed,
And every ugly thing I have concealed
And every folly I have enacted
Whether I have hidden or announced it,
Or I have concealed it or manifested it

verses.text: وَكُلَّ سَيِّئَةٍ أَمَرْتَ بِإِثْبَاتِهَا الْكِرَامَ الكَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: And every evil act which You hast commanded the Noble Writers to record,

verses.text: الَّذِينَ وَكَّلْتَهُم بِحِفْظِ مَا يَكُونُ مِنِّي
verses.translation: Those whom You hast appointed to watch over what appears from me
verses.transliteration: AL-LADHINA WAK-KAL-TAHUM BI-HIF-ZI MA YAKUNU MIN-NI

verses.translation: And whom You hast made, along with my bodily members, witness against me.

verses.text: وَكُنتَ أَنتَ الرَّقِيبَ عَلَيَّ مِن وَّرَائِهِمْ،
verses.translation: And You wast Yourself the Watcher over me from behind them,
And the Witness of what is hidden from them
But through Your mercy You concealed it
And through Your bounty You veiled it.

verses.text: وَأَن تُوَفِّرَ حَظِّي مِن كُلِّ خَيْرٍ تُنْزِلُهُ،
verses.translation: [And I ask You] that You bestowest upon me an abundant share of every good You sendest down,
verses.transliteration: WA AN TUWF-FIRA HAZ-ZI MIN KUL-LI KHAYRIN TUNZILUH

verses.translation: Or kindness You conferrest,
Or goodness You unfoldest,
Or provision You spreadest out,
Or sin You forgivest,
Or error You coverest.

verses.text: يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ
verses.translation: My Lord! My Lord! My Lord!
verses.transliteration: YA RAB-BI YA RAB-BI YA RABB

verses.text: يَا إِلَهِي وَسَيِّدِي وَمَوْلاي وَمَاِلكَ رِقِّي
verses.translation: My God! My Master! My Protector! Owner of my bondage!
verses.transliteration: YA ILAHI WA SAY-YIDI WA MAW-LAYA WA MALIKA RIQ-QI

verses.translation: O He in whose hand is my forelock!
O He who knows my affliction and my misery!
O He who is aware of my poverty and indigence!

verses.text: يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ
verses.translation: My Lord! My Lord! My Lord!
verses.transliteration: YA RAB-BI YA YA RAB-BI YA RABB

verses.translation: I ask You by Your Truth and Your Holiness
And the greatest of Your Attributes and Names,

verses.text: أن تَجْعَلَ أَوْقَاتِي فِي اللَّيلِ وَالنَّهَارِ بِذِكْرِكَ مَعْمُورَةً،
verses.translation: That You makest my times in the night and the day inhabited by Your remembrance,
verses.transliteration: AN TAJ-`ALA AW-QATI FIL-LAYLI WAN-NAHARI BI-DHIK-RIKA MA`MURAH

verses.translation: And joined to Your service
And my works acceptable to You,

verses.text: حَتَّى تَكُونَ أَعْمَاِلي وَأَوْرَادِي كُلُّهَا وِرْداً وَّاحِداً،
verses.translation: So that my works and my litanies may all be a single litany
verses.transliteration: HAT-TA TAKUNA A`MALI WA AW-RADI KUL-LUHA WIR-DAW-WAHIDAN

verses.translation: And my occupation with Your service everlasting.

verses.text: يَا سَيِّدِي، يَا مَنْ عَلَيْهِ مُعَوَّلِي
verses.translation: My Master! O He upon whom I depend!
O He to whom I complain about my states!

verses.text: يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ يَا رَبِّ
verses.translation: My Lord! My Lord! My Lord!
verses.transliteration: YA RAB-BI YA RAB-BI YA RABB

verses.translation: Strengthen my bodily members in Your service,
And fortify my ribs in determination
And bestow upon me earnestness in my fear of You
And continuity in my being joined to Your service

verses.text: حَتَّى أَسْرَحَ إِلَيكَ فِي مَيَادِينِ السَّابِقِينَ
verses.translation: So that I may move easily toward You in the battlefields of the foremost
And hurry to You among the prominent
And desire fervently Your proximity among the fervently desirous
And move nearer to You with the nearness of the sincere
And fear You with the fear of those who have certitude
And gather with the believers in Your vicinity.
O Allah, whoever desires evil for me, desire [it] for him!
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA WA MAN ARADANI BISUO-IN FARID-HU

verses.translation: whoever deceives me-deceive him!

verses.text: وَاجْعَلْنِي مِنْ أَحَسَنِ عَبِيدِكَ نَصِيباً عِنْدَكَ
verses.translation: And make me one of the most excellent of Your slaves in Portion from You,
And the nearest of them in station to You
And the most elected of them in proximity to You.

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُ لا يُنَالُ ذَلِكَ إِلاَّ بِفَضْلِكَ
verses.translation: For that cannot be attained except by Your bounty.
verses.transliteration: FA-IN-NAHU LA YUNALU DHA-LIKA IL-LA BI-FADLIK

verses.translation: And grant generously to me through Your munificence,
And incline toward me with Your splendour
And protect me with Your mercy!
And make my tongue remember You without ceasing
And my heart enthralled by Your love!
And be gracious to me by answering me favourably,
And nullify my slips
And forgive my lapses!
For You hast decreed Your worship for Your servants
And commanded them to supplicate You
And assured them that they would be answered.
So toward You, my Lord, I have turned my face
And toward You, my Lord, I have extended my hand.
verses.transliteration: WA ILAYKA YA RAB-BI MADAD-TU YADI

verses.translation: So by Your might, comply with my supplication
And make me attain my desires!
Do not severe my hoping for Your Favours

verses.text: وَاكْفِنِي شَرَّ الْجِنِّ وَالإِنْسِ مِنْ أَعْدَائِي
verses.translation: And spare me the evil of my enemies from among the jinn and men!
O He, whose pleasure is quickly achieved!

verses.text: اغْفِرْ لِمَن لا يَمْلِكُ إِلاَّ الدُّعَاءَ
verses.translation: Forgive him who owns nothing but supplication
For You dost what You wilt.
O He whose Name is a remedy,
And whose remembrance is a cure,
And whose obedience is wealth!
Have mercy upon him whose capital is hope
And whose weapon is tears!
O Ample in blessings!
O Repeller of adversities!
O Light of those who are lonely in the darkness!
O Knower who was never taught!
Bless Muhammad and Muhammad's household!
And do with me what is worthy of You!

verses.text: وَصَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَى رَسُولِهِ وَالأَئِمَّةِ الْمَيَامِينَ مِنْ آلِهِ
verses.translation: And Allah bless His messenger and the holy Imams of his household
verses.transliteration: WA SAL-LALLAHU `ALA RASULIHI WAL-AIMMATIL-MAYAMINA MIN A-LIHI

verses.translation: And give them abundant peace!
O Lord of mighty prowess!
O Lord of mighty power!

verses.text: يَا عَزِيزُ يَا عَزِيزُ يَا عَزِيزُ
verses.translation: O Exalted in might! O Exalted in might! O Exalted in might!
Submissive to Your Almightiness are all of Your creatures;
so, (please) save me from the evil of Your creatures.
O All-liberal! O All-bountiful!
O Source of all bounties! O Doer of favors!

verses.text: يَا لاَ إِلٰهَ إِلاَّ انْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ
verses.translation: O He save Whom there is no god! All glory be to You!
verses.transliteration: YA LA ILAHA ILLA ANTA SUBHANAKA

verses.translation: Verily, I have been a wrongdoer.
So We heard his prayer and saved him from the anguish.
verses.transliteration: FASTAJABNA LAHU WA NAJJAYNAHU MIN ALGHAMMI

verses.translation: Thus do We save the believers.

verses.text: وَصَلَّىٰ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِهِ ٱلطَّيِّبِينَ ٱلطَّاهِرِينَ
verses.translation: May Allah send blessings to Muhammad and his Household, the pure and immaculate.
verses.transliteration: WA SALLA ALLAHU `ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALIHI ALTTAYYIBINA ALTTAHIRINA

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
verses.translation: O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA SALLI ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALI MUHAMMAD

verses.translation: In the Name of Allāh,the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

verses.text: عَنْ فاطِمَةَ الزَّهْراءِ عَلَيْهَا اَلسلام بِنْتِ رَسُول ِاللّه صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ أَنَّها قالَتْ :
verses.translation: Fatimatuz-Zahra, the daughter of the Prophet (s), peace be on them, is to have thus related ( an event ) :

verses.text: دَخَلَ عَلَيَّ أَبِي رَسُولُ اللّهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ فِي بَعْضِ الاْيَّامِ فَقالَ:
verses.translation: My father, the Prophet (s) of Allah, came to my house one day and said to me:
verses.transliteration: DAKHALA A'LAY-YA ABEE RASOOLUL-LAAHI (S) FEE BAA'-Z'IL AY-YAAMI FAQAALA :

verses.translation: "Peace be on you, Fatimah"
I replied : "And upon you be peace"

verses.text: قالَ: إِنِّي أَجِدُ فِي بَدَنِي ضُعْفا
verses.translation: Then he said : "I feel weakness in my body"
verses.transliteration: QAALA : IN-NEEE AJIDU FEE BADANEE Z'UA'-FAAN'

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ لَهُ: أُعِيذُكَ بِاللّهِ يَا أَبَتاهُ مِنَ الضُّعْفِ
verses.translation: I said : "May Allah protect you from weakness, father"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU LAHOOO : UE'ED'UKA BIL-LAAHI YAA ABATAAHOO MANAZ'-Z'UA'FI

verses.text: فَقَالَ: ”يَا فَاطِمَةُ! ٱئْتِينِي بِٱلْكِسَاءِ ٱلْيَمَانِيِّ فَغَطِّينِي بِهِ.
verses.translation: He said : "Fatimah, please bring the Yemeni cloak and cover me with it"
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA : YAA FAAT'IMATU EE-TEENEE BIL-KASAAA-IL-YAMAANEE FAGHAT-TEENEE BIHI

verses.translation: So, I brought the Yemeni cloak and covered him with it.

verses.text: وَصرْتُ أَنْظُرُ إِلَيْهِ وَإِذا وَجْهُهُ يَتَلَأَلَؤُ
verses.translation: Then, I looked at him and saw that his face was shining
verses.transliteration: WA S'UR-TU ANZ'URU ILAY-HEE WA ID'AA WAJ-HAHOO YATAL-LAU

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُ الْبَدْرُ فِي لَيْلَة تَمامِهِ وَكَمالِهِ
verses.translation: like a full moon with its glory and splendor
verses.transliteration: KAAN-NAHUL-BAD-RU FEE LAY-LATI TAMAAMIHEE WA KAMAALIH

verses.text: فَمَا كانَتْ إِلاّ ساعَةً وَإِذا بِوَلَدِيَ الْحَسَنِ عليه السلام قَدْ أَقْبَلَ
verses.translation: After a while, my son Hasan came in
verses.transliteration: FAMAA KAANAT IL-LAA SAAA'TAW-WA ID'AA BIWALADIYAL-H'ASANI (ALAYHIS-SALAAM) QAD AQ-BALA

verses.translation: and said : "Peace be on you, mother"
verses.transliteration: WA QAALA : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KI YAAA UM-MAAH

verses.text: فَقُلتُ: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِي وَثَمَرَةَ فُؤَادِي
verses.translation: I replied : "And upon you be peace, O light of my eyes, and the delight of my heart"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU : WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAA QUR-RATA A'Y-NEE WA THAMARATA FUAADEE

verses.text: فَقَالَ: يَا أُمَّاهُ إِنِّي أَشَمُّ عِنْدَكِ رائِحَةً طَيِّبَةً
verses.translation: He then said : "O Mother! I smell a fragrance so sweet
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA : YAA UM-MAAHOO IN-NEE ASHUM-MU I'NDAKI RAAA-IH'ATIN TAY-YIBATIN

verses.text: كَأَنَّها رائِحَةُ جَدِّي رَسُولِ اللّه صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ
verses.translation: and so pure as that of my grandfather, the Prophet (s) of Allah"

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ: نَعَمْ إِنَّ جَدَّكَ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: I replied : "Yes. Your grandfather is underneath the cloak"

verses.text: فَأَقْبَلَ الْحَسَنُ نَحْوَ الْكِساءِ وَقالَ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا جَدَّاهُ يَا رَسُولَ اللّهِ
verses.translation: Hasan went near the cloak and said : "Peace be on you, my grandfather, the Prophet (s) of Allah;
verses.transliteration: FA AQ-BALAL-H'ASANU NAH'-WAL-KISAAA-I WA QAALA : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAA JAD-DAAHOO YAA RASOOLAL-LAAHI

verses.text: أَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَدْخُلَ مَعَكَ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: May I enter the cloak with you?"
verses.transliteration: ATA-D'ANU LEEE AN AD-KHULA MAA'KA TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.text: فَقالَ: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا وَلَدِي وَيَا صاحِبَ حَوْضِي
verses.translation: He replied : "And upon you be peace, my son and the master of my fountain (Kauthar),
verses.transliteration: QAALA : WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAA WALADEE WA YAA S'AAH'IBA H'AWZ'EE

verses.translation: you are given the permission to enter"
So, Hasan entered the cloak with him

verses.text: فَمَا كانَتْ إِلاَّ ساعَةً وَإِذا بِوَلَدِيَ الْحُسَيْنِ قَدْ أَقْبَلَ وَقالَ
verses.translation: After a while, my Husain came in and said :
verses.transliteration: FAMAA KAANAT IL-LAA SAAA'TAW-WA ID'AA BIWALADIAL-H'USAY-NI QAD AQ-BALA WA QAALA :

verses.translation: "Peace be on you, mother"

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا وَلَدِي وَيَا قُرَّةَ عَيْنِي وَثَمَرَةَ فُؤَادِي.
verses.translation: I replied : "And upon you be peace, O light of my eyes, and the delight of my heart"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU : WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAA WALADEE WA YAA QUR-RATA A'Y-NEE WA THAMARATA FUAADEE

verses.text: فَقَالَ لِي: يَا أُمَّاهُ إِنِّي أَشَمُّ عِنْدَكِ رائِحَةً طَيِّبَةً
verses.translation: He then said : "O Mother! I smell a fragrance so sweet
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA LEE : YAAA UM-MAAHOO IN-NEE SHUMMU I'NDAKI RAAA-IH'ATIN TAY-YIBATAN

verses.text: كَأَنَّها رائِحَةُ جَدِّي رَسُولِ اللّهُ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ.
verses.translation: and so pure as that of my grandfather, the Prophet (s) of Allah"

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ: نَعَمْ إِنَّ جَدَّكَ وَأَخاكَ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ.
verses.translation: I replied : "Yes. Your grandfather and your brother are underneath the cloak"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU : NAA'M IN-NA JAD-DAKA WA AKHAAKA TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.translation: Husain stepped towards the cloak

verses.text: وَقالَ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا جَدَّاهُ السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا مَنِ اخْتارَهُ اللّهُ
verses.translation: and said : "Peace be on you, my grandfather, the Chosen of Allah;
verses.transliteration: WA QAALA : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAA JAD-DAHOOS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAA MANIKH-TAARAHUL-LAHOO

verses.text: أَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَكُونَ مَعَكُما تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: May I enter the cloak with you?"
verses.transliteration: ATA-D'ANU LEEE AN AD-KHULA MAA'KUMAA TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.translation: He replied : "And upon you be peace, my son

verses.text: وَيَا شافِعَ أُمَّتِي قَدْ أَذِنْتُ لَكَ.
verses.translation: and interceder of my followers, you are given the permission to enter"
verses.transliteration: WA YAA SHAAFIA'A UM-MATEE QAD AD'-INTU LAK

verses.translation: So, Husain entered the cloak with them.

verses.text: فَأَ قْبَلَ عِنْدَ ذلِكَ أَبُو الْحَسَنِ عَلِيُّ بْنُ أَبِي طالِبٍ
verses.translation: After a while, Abul Hasan, Ali bin Abi Talib came in
verses.transliteration: FAAQ-BALA I'NDA D'AALIKA ABUL-H'ASANI A'LEE-YUB-NU ABEE T'AALIBIW-

verses.text: وَقالَ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكِ يَا بِنْتَ رَسُولِ اللّهِ.
verses.translation: and said : "Peace be on you, O daughter of the Prophet (s) of Allah"
verses.transliteration: WA QAALA : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KI YAA BINTA RASOOLIL-LAAH

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا أَبَا الْحَسَنِ وَيَا أَمِيرَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ.
verses.translation: I replied : "And upon you be peace, O father of Hasan, and the Commander of the faithful"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAA ABAL-H'ASANI WA YAAA AMEERAL-MUMINEEN

verses.text: فَقالَ: يَا فاطِمَةُ إِنِّي أَشَمُّ عِنْدَكِ رائِحَةً طَيِّبَةً
verses.translation: He then said : "O Fatima! I smell a fragrance so sweet and so pure
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA YAA FAAT'IMATU IN-NEE ASHUM-MU I'NDAKI RAAA-IH'ATAN TAY-YIBATAN

verses.text: كَانَّهَا رائِحَةُ أَخِي وَابْنِ عَمِّي رَسُولِ اللّه صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ.
verses.translation: as that of my brother and my cousin, the Prophet (s) of Allah"
verses.transliteration: KAAN-NAHAA RAAA-IH'ATU AKHEE WAB-NI A'M-MEE RASOOLIL-LAAH SALLALLAHU ALAIHI WA ALIHI WASALLAM

verses.text: فَقُلْتُ: نَعَمْ هَا هُوَ مَعَ وَلَدَيْكَ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: I replied: "Yes. He is underneath the cloak with your two sons"
verses.transliteration: FAQUL-TU NAA'M HAA HOOA MAA' WALADAY-KA TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.translation: So, Ali went near the cloak

verses.text: وَقالَ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا رَسُولَ اللّهِ
verses.translation: and said : "Peace be on you, Prophet (s) of Allah;
verses.transliteration: WA QAALA : ASSALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAA RASOOLAL-LAAHI

verses.text: وأَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَكُونَ مَعَكُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: May I enter the cloak with you?"
verses.transliteration: ATA-D'ANU LEEE AN AKOO-NA MAA'KUM TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.text: قالَ لَهُ: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا أَخِي ويَا وَصِيِّي
verses.translation: He replied : "And upon you be peace, my brother, my successor,
verses.transliteration: QAALA LAHU : WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAAA AKHEE WA YAA WAS'EE

verses.text: وَخَلِيفَتِي وَصاحِبَ لِوَائِي قَدْ أَذِنْتُ لَكَ
verses.translation: my successor, and my standard bearer, you are given the permission to enter"
verses.transliteration: WA KHALEE-FATEE WA S'AAH'IBA LIWAAA-EE QAD AD'INTU LAK

verses.translation: So, Ali entered the cloak with them.
Then I stepped forward

verses.text: وَقُلْتُ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا أَبَتاهُ يَا رَسُولَ اللّهِ
verses.translation: and said : "Peace be on you, my father, O Prophet (s) of Allah;
verses.transliteration: WA QUL-TU : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAAA ABATAAH YAA RASOOLAL-LAAHI

verses.text: أَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَكُونَ مَعَكُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: May I enter the cloak with you?"
verses.transliteration: ATA-D'ANU LEEE AN AKOO-NA MAA'KUM TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.text: قالَ: وَعَلَيْكِ السَّلامُ يَا بِنْتِي وَيَا بِضْعَتِي قَدْ أَذِنْتُ لَكِ
verses.translation: He replied : "And upon you be peace, my daughter, O part of myself; you are given the permission to enter"
verses.transliteration: QAALA : WA A'LAY-KIS-SALAAMU YAA BINTEE YAA BAZ'-ATEE QAD AD'INTU LAKI

verses.translation: So, I entered the cloak with them.

verses.text: فَلَمَّا اكْتَمَلْنا جَمِيعاً تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ أَخَذَ أَبِي رَسُولُ اللّه بِطَرَفَي الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: Getting together underneath the cloak, my father, the Prophet (s) of Allah, held the two ends of the cloak
verses.transliteration: FAL-LAMAK-TAMAL-NAA JAMEE-A'N TAH'-TAL-KISAAA-I AKHAD'A ABEE RASOOLUL-LAAHI BITARAFAYIL-KISAAA-I

verses.text: وَأَوْمَأَ بِيَدِهِ ٱلْيُمْـنٰى إِلَى السَّماءِ وَقالَ:
verses.translation: and raised his right hand towards the heavens and prayed :
verses.transliteration: WA AW-MAA BIYADIHIL-YUM-NAA ILAS-SAMAAA-I WA QAALA :

verses.text: اللّهُمَّ إِنَّ هَؤُلاءِ أَهْلُ بَيْتِي وَخاصَّتِي وَحامَّتِي
verses.translation: "O Allah, these are the people of my Household (Ahlul-Bayt). They are my confidants and my supporters.
verses.transliteration: AL-LAAHUM-MA IN-NA HAA-ULAAA-I AH-LU BAY-TEE WA KHAAAS'-S'ATEE WA H'AAAM-MATEE

verses.translation: Their flesh is my flesh and their blood is my blood.
Whoever hurts them, hurts me too.
Whoever displeases them, displeases me too.
I am at war with those who are at war with them.
I am at peace with those who are at peace with them.
I am the enemy of their enemies
and I am the friend of their friends.
They are from me and I am from them.
O Allah! Bestow Your Blessings, Benevolence,
verses.transliteration: FAJ-A'L S'ALAWAATIKA WA BARAKAATIKA WA RAH'-MATIKA

verses.translation: Forgiveness and Your pleasure upon me and upon them.

verses.text: وَعَلَيْهِمْ وَأَذْهِبْ عَنْهُمُ الرِّجْسَ وَطَهِّرْهُمْ تَطْهِيراً.
verses.translation: And keep them away from impurity (and flaws) and keep them thoroughly purified"
verses.transliteration: WA A'LAY-HIM WA AD'-HIB A'N-HUMUR-RIJ-SA WA TAH-HIRUHUM TAT-HEERA

verses.translation: Then the Lord, Almighty Allah said :
"O My angels! O Residents of My Heavens,
verses.transliteration: YAA MALAAA-IKATEE WA YAA SUK-KAANA SAMAAWAATEEE

verses.text: إِنِّي إمَا خَلَقْتُ سَماءً مَبْنِيَّةً وَلاَ أَرْضاً مَدْحِيَّةً وَلاَ قَمَراً مُنِيراً
verses.translation: verily, I have not created the erected Sky, the stretched earth, the illuminated moon,
verses.transliteration: IN-NEE MAA KHALAQ-TU SAMAA-AM-MAB-NEE-YATAW-WA LAA AR-Z'AM-MAD-H'EE-YATAW-WA LAA QAMARAM-MUNEERAW-

verses.text: وَلاَ شَمْساً مُضِيئَةً وَلاَ فَلَكاً يَدُورُ وَلاَ بَحْراً يَجْرِي وَلاَ فُلْكاً يَسْرِي
verses.translation: the bright sun, the rotating planets, the flowing seas and the sailing ships,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA SHAM-SAM-MUZ'EEE-ATAW-WA LAA FALAKAY-YADOO-RU WA LAA BAH'-RAY-YAJ-REEE WA LAA FULKAL YASREE

verses.text: إِلاَّ فِي مَحَبَّةِ هَؤلاءِ الْخَمْسَةِ الَّذِينَ هُمْ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ.
verses.translation: but for the love of these Five underneath the cloak"
verses.transliteration: IL-LAA FEE MAH'AB-BATI HAA-ULAAA-IL-KHAM-SATIL-LAD'EE-NA HUM TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.text: فَقالَ الاْمِينُ جَبْرائِيلُ: يَارَبِّ وَمَنْ تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ
verses.translation: Gabriel, the trusted angel, asked : "Who are under the cloak?"
verses.transliteration: FAQAALAL-AMEENU JIB-RAAA-EE-LU : YAA RAB-BI WA MAN TAH'-TAL-KISAAA

verses.translation: The Almighty answered :

verses.text: هُمْ أَهْلُ بَيْتِ النُّبُوَّةِ وَمَعْدِنُ الرِّسالَةِ
verses.translation: "They are the Household of the Prophet (s) and the assets of Prophet hood.
They are : Fatimah, her father, her husband and her two sons"
verses.transliteration: HUM : FAAT'IMATU WA ABOOHAA WA BAA'-LUHAA WA BANOO-HAA

verses.text: فَقالَ جَبْرائِيلُ: يَارَبِّ أَتَأْذَنُ لِي أَنْ أَهْبِطَ إِلَى الاْرْضِ
verses.translation: Gabriel said : "O Lord, May I fly to earth
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA JIB-RAAA-EE-LU : YAA RAB-BI ATA-D'ANU LEEE AN AH-BITA ILAL-AR-Z'I

verses.translation: to be the sixth of them?"

verses.text: فَقالَ اللّهُ: نَعَمْ قَدْ أَذِنْتُ لَكَ.
verses.translation: Allah replied: "Yes. You are given the permission"

verses.text: فَهَبَطَ الاْمِينُ جَبْرائِيلُ وَقالَ: السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ يَا رَسُولَ اللّهِ
verses.translation: Gabriel, the trusted, landed near them and said : "Peace be on you, O Prophet (s) of Allah.
verses.transliteration: FAHABATALAMEENU JIB-RAAA-EE-LU WA QAALA : AS-SALAAMU A'LAY-KA YAA RASOOLAL-LAAHIL-

verses.text: الْعَلِيُّ الاْعْلى يُقْرِئُكَ السَّلام َوَيَخُصُّكَ بِالتَّحِيَّةِ وَالاْكْرامِ
verses.translation: The All-Highest conveys His peace on you and His greetings
verses.transliteration: A'LEE-YUL-AA'-LAA YUQ-RIUKAS-SALAAMU WA YAKHUS'-S'UKA BIL-TAH'EEY-YATI WA LIK-RAAM

verses.translation: and says: "By My Honor and Glory, O My angels! O Residents of My Heavens,
verses.transliteration: WA YAQOO-LU LAKA : WA IZ'-ZATEE WA JALAALEE

verses.translation: verily, I have not created the erected Sky,

verses.text: وَلاَ أَرْضاً مَدْحِيَّةً وَلاَ قَمَراً مُنِيراً وَلاَ شَمْساً مُضِيئَةً
verses.translation: the stretched earth, the illuminated moon, the bright sun,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA AR-Z'AM-MAD-H'EE-YATAW-WA LAA QAMARAM-MUNEERAN WA LAA SHAM-SAM-MUZ'EEEATAW-

verses.text: وَلاَ فَلَكاً يَدُورُ وَلاَ بَحْراً يَجْرِي وَلاَ فُلْكاً يَسْرِي
verses.translation: the rotating planets, the flowing seas and the sailing ships,
verses.transliteration: WA LAA FALKAL YADUR WA LAA BAH'-RAY-YAJ-REE WA LAA FUL-KAY-YAS-REEE

verses.translation: but for your sake and love"

verses.text: وَقَدْ أَذِنَ لِي أَنْ أَدْخُلَ مَعَكُمْ
verses.translation: and Allah has given me permission to enter the cloak with you.
verses.transliteration: WA QAD AD'INA LEEE AN AD-KHULA MAA'KUM

verses.text: فَهَلْ تَأْذَنُ لِي يَا رَسُولَ اللّه
verses.translation: May I join you, O Prophet (s) of Allah?"

verses.text: فَقالَ رَسُولُ اللّه: وَعَلَيْكَ السَّلامُ يَا أَمِينَ وَحْي اللّهِ
verses.translation: The Prophet (s) replied : "And peace be on you, O trusted bearer of Allah's Revelations!
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA RASOOLUL-LAAHI : WA A'LAY-KAS-SALAAMU YAA AMEE-NA WAH'-YIL-LAAHI

verses.translation: you are granted the permission"
So, Gabriel entered the cloak with us

verses.text: فَقالَ لاِبِي: إِنَّ اللّهَ قَدْ أَوْحَى إِلَيْكُمْ يَقُولُ:
verses.translation: and said to my father : Allah sends His Revelations to you;
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA LI-ABEE : IN-NAL-LAAHA QAD AW-H'AAA ILAY-KUM YAQOOLU :

verses.text: إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ اللّهُ لِيُذْهِبَ عَنْكُمُ الرِّجْسَ
verses.translation: "Verily Allah's desire is to keep you away from impurity (and flaws),
O People of Household (Ahlul-Bayt) and keep you thoroughly purified"

verses.text: فَقالَ عَلِيٌّ لاِبِي: يَا رَسُولَ اللّه أَخْبِرْنِي مَا لِجُلُوسِنا
verses.translation: Then Ali said to my father : "O Prophet (s) of Allah, tell me
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA A'LEE-YUL LI-ABEE : YAA RASOOLAL-LAAHI AKH-BIR-NEE MAA LIJULOOSINAA

verses.text: هذَا تَحْتَ الْكِساءِ مِنَ الْفَضْلِ عِنْدَ اللّهُ
verses.translation: what significance has Allah given for getting together underneath this cloak ?"

verses.text: فَقالَ النَّبِيُّ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ:
verses.translation: The Prophet (s) replied :
"By Him who rightfully appointed me a Prophet (s)
and chose me a Messenger for the salvation of the mankind.

verses.text: مَا ذُكِرَ خَبَرُنا هذَا فِي مَحْفِلٍ مِنْ مَحافِلِ
verses.translation: whenever and wherever an assembly
verses.transliteration: MAA D'UKIRA KHABARUNAA HAAD'AA FEE MAH'-FALIM-MIM-MAH'AAFILI

verses.text: أَهْلِ الاْرْضِ وَفِيهِ جَمْعٌ مِنْ شِيعَتِنا وَمُحِّبِينا
verses.translation: of our followers and friends mention this event,
verses.transliteration: AH-LIL-AR-Z'I WA FEE-HI JAM-U'M-MIN SHEE-A'TINAA WA MUH'-IB-BEE-NAA

verses.translation: Allah will bestow on them His Blessings and Mercy;

verses.text: وَحَفَّتْ بِهِمُ الْمَلائِكَةُ وَاسْتَغْفَرَتْ لَهُمْ إِلى أَنْ يَتَفَرَّقُوا.
verses.translation: angels will encircle them asking Allah the remission of their sins until the assembly disperses
verses.transliteration: WA H'AF-FAT BIHIMU LAMALAAA-IKAH WAS-TAGH-FARAT LAHUM ILAAA AY-YATAFAR-RAQOO

verses.text: فَقالَ عَلِيٌّ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ: إِذنْ وَاللّهِ فُزْنَا وَفازَ شِيعَتُنا وَرَبِّ الْكَعْبَةِ.
verses.translation: So Ali said : "Verily, by the Lord of Kabaa! we and our followers are the winners"
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA A'LEE-YUN A'LAY-HIS-SALAAMU : ID'AW-WAL-LAAHI FUZ-NAA WA FAAZA SHEE-A'TUNAA WA RAB-BIL-KAA'-BAH

verses.text: فَقالَ أَبِي رَسُولُ اللّهِ صَلَّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَآلِهِ:
verses.translation: Then my father replied :
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA ABEE RASOOLUL-LAAHI S'AL-LAL-LAAHO A'LAY-HI WA AAALIHI:

verses.text: يَا عَلِيُّ وَالَّذِي بَعَثَنِي بِالْحَقِّ نَبِيّاً
verses.translation: "By Him who rightfully appointed me a Prophet
verses.transliteration: YAA A'LEE-YU WAL-LAD'EE BAA'THANEE BIL-H'AQ-QI NABEE-YAW

verses.translation: and chose me a Messenger for the salvation of the mankind,

verses.text: مَا ذُكِرَ خَبَرُنا هذَا فِي مَحْفِلٍ مِنْ مَحَافِلِ أَهْلِ الاْرْضِ
verses.translation: whenever and wherever an assembly
verses.transliteration: MA D'UKIRA KHABARUNAA HAAD'AA FEE MAH'-FALIM-MIM-MAH'AAFILI AH-LIL AR-Z'I

verses.translation: our followers and friends mentions this event,
verses.transliteration: WA FEE-HI JAM-U'M-MIN SHEE-A'TINAA WA MUH'IB-BEE-NAA

verses.text: وَفِيهِمْ مَهْمُومٌ إِلاَّ وَفَرَّجَ اللّهُ هَمَّهُ
verses.translation: there shall remain none grieved but Allah will remove his grief,
verses.transliteration: WA FEE-HIM MAH-MOO-MUN IL-LAA WA FAR-RAJAL-LAAHO HAM-MAHOO

verses.text: وَلاَ مَغْمُومٌ إِلاَّ وَكَشَفَ اللّهُ غَمَّهُ
verses.translation: there shall remain none distressed but Allah will dispel his distress,
verses.transliteration: WALAA MAGH-MOO-MUN IL-LAA WA KASHAFAL-LAAHO GHAM-MAHOO

verses.text: وَلاَ طالِبُ حاجَةٍ إِلاَّ وَقَضَى اللّهُ حاجَتَهُ.
verses.translation: there shall remain none wish-seeker but Allah will grant his wish."
verses.transliteration: WA LAA T'AALIBU H'AAJATIN IL-LAA WA QAZ'AL-LAAHO H'AAJATAH

verses.text: فَقالَ عَلِيٌّ عَلَيْهِ السَّلامُ: إِذن وَاللّه فُزْنا وَسُعِدْنا وَكَذلِكَ شِيعَتُنا
verses.translation: `Ali, peace be upon him, said, "Then, we have won and attained pleasure. I swear it by Allah. So have our adherents;
verses.transliteration: FAQAALA A'LEE-YUN A'LAY-HIS-SALAAMU ID'AAW-WAL-LAAHI FUZ-NAA WA SUI'D-NAA WA KAD'AALIKA SHEE-ATUNAA

verses.text: فازُوا وَسُعِدُوا فِي الدُّنْيا وَالاْخِرَةِ وَرَبِّ الْكَعْبَةِ.
verses.translation: they have won and attained pleasure in this world and in the Hereafter. I swear it by the Lord of the Ka`bah."
verses.transliteration: FAAZOO WA SUI'DOO FID-DUNYAA WAL AAAKHIRATI WA RAB-BIL-KAA'-BAH

verses.text: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ وَآلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
verses.translation: O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA SALLI ALA MUHAMMADIN WA ALI MUHAMMAD

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ انْفَعْنِي بِمَا عَلَّمْتَنِي وَعَلِّمْنِي مَا يَنْفَعُنِي
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Make useful for me what You have taught me and teach me knowledge that will be useful to me.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INFA'NII BIMAA 'ALLAMTANII WA'ALLIMNII MAA YANFA'UUNII

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ فَهْمَ النَّبِيِّينَ وَحِفْظَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ وَالْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! I ask You for the understanding of the prophets and the memory of the messengers, and those nearest to You.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INII AS'ALUKA FAHMAL-NABIYYEN WA HIFTHAL MURSALEEN AL-MUQARRABEEN

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِسَانِي عَامِرًا بِذِكْرِكَ وَقَلْبِي بِخَشْيَتِكَ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Make my tongue full of Your remembrance and my heart with consciousness of You.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA IJ'AL LISANEE 'AMIRAN BI DHIKRIKA WA QALBI BI KHASHYATIKA

verses.text: إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ مَا تَشَاءُ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنْتَ حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! You do whatever You wish, and You are my Availer and Protector and the best of aid.
verses.transliteration: INNAKA 'ALA MA-TASHA'U QADEER WA ANTA HASBUNA-ALLAHU WA NI'MAL WAKEEL

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا
verses.translation: Oh Allah! Nothing is easy except what You have made easy.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA LA SAHLA ILLAMA JA-‘ALTAHU SAHLA

verses.translation: If You wish, You can make the difficult easy.
verses.transliteration: TAJ‘ALU AL HAZANA ETHA MA SHI’TA SAHLA

verses.text: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَوْدِعُكَ مَا قَرَأْتُ وَمَا حَفِظْتُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! I entrust You with what I have read and I have studied.
verses.transliteration: ALLAHUMMA INNI ASTAODI'UKA MA QARA'TU WAMA HAFATH-TU

verses.translation: Oh Allah! Bring it back to me when I am in need of it.

verses.text: إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ مَا تَشَاءُ قَدِيرٌ وَأَنْتَ حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
verses.translation: Oh Allah! You do whatever You wish, You are my Availer and Protector and the best of aid.
verses.transliteration: INNAKA 'ALA MA-TASHA'-U QADEER WA ANTA HASBUNA ALLAH WA NI'MAL WAKEEL
